name: Escape Car Quest
description:
A brain training game that players should escape their cars from the parking lots placed all over the city.
The rule is simple. with a simple slide control, move other cars in the parking lot and pull out the red car to escape to the exit.

[Features]
- Game for everyone. Various levels supported (Easy, Normal, Hard, Professional)
- Various level of challenges and missions supported.
- With the simply playing the game everyday, players can get hint items.
- Hint item shows you how to solve the stage missions.
- Multiplayer mode : compete with players from all around the world.
- Use the rewind feature to reverse your mistakes.
- Achievements, Leaderboards supported and enjoy the game with your friends.
